headline: Masco Corporation Announces Date for Earnings Release and Conference Call for 2025 Fourth Quarter and Full Year
summary: LIVONIA, Mich., January 12, 2026--Masco Corporation (NYSE: MAS) announced today that it will hold a conference call regarding 2025 fourth quarter and full year results on Tuesday, February 10, 2026, at 8:00 a.m. ET. The conference call will be hosted by Masco President and Chief Executive Officer Jon Nudi. Participants in the call are asked to register five to ten minutes prior to the scheduled start time by dialing (800) 549-8228 or (289) 819-1520. Please use the conference identification numbe
